paragraph.name: intro
paragraph.description: When an area has a rich history, past and present donâ€™t always reconcile. Yerba Buena is an historic neighborhood in the heart of downtown San Francisco that had lost its identity. Working closely with the Yerba Buena Community Benefit District (YBCBD), we defined the brand strategy and experience that allowed Yerba Buena to embrace its heritage and define its future.
